title: Udemy After Effects CC: Create Stunning Video Transitions Easily
description:
Description
In this course you will learn how to use the extremely powerful Adobe After Effects to create some awesome video / slideshow transitions like the ones in the promo video.
At the end of this After Effects course:
    You will be familiar with Adobe After Effects layout, essential key terms and basic features
    You’ll acquire different and powerful skills to master transition animations in Adobe After Effects
    You’ll learn some important Adobe After Effects shortcuts
    You’ll be able to create Lines Transition using Adobe After Effects
    You’ll be able to create Shape Transition using Adobe After Effects
    You’ll be able to create Custom Shape Transition using Adobe After Effects
    You’ll be able to create Liquid Transition using Adobe After Effects
    You’ll be able to create Warp Transition using Adobe After Effects
    You’ll be able to create Optical Transition using Adobe After Effects
    You’ll be able to create Camera Shake Transition using Adobe After Effects
    You will also get the After Effects project files and the necessary assets to work along with

Who is the target audience?
    Absoulte Adobe After Effects Beginners who enjoy learning by doing ( Project-based Approach Course )
    Youtube, Vimeo &Publishers
    Anyone who wants to spice up their videos with animated transitions
    Anyone who is completely new to After Effects

Requirements
    Any trial / running version of Adobe After Effects not older than CS3

parsed.name: Udemy After Effects CC: Create Stunning Video Transitions Easily
